feed.title: Ben And Isaac Media
feed.subtitle: We try to entertain you, with varying levels of success

entry.title: Welcome to our blog thing!
entry.content:
Hello there!

I’m Ben, I do programming things and I run my own channel as well as Ben and Isaac Plays

Here you'll find updates as well as other things to do with the channel
